name: [+18] Miho Adventures (alpha)
description:
Miho Adventures is a game that is constantly updated.
Controls:

Left/Right: Move
Z = Attack/Confirm
X = Jump
C = H animation
Enter = Confirm

This game is in ALPHA (under creation), so i'll be updating the visuals, quests, mechanics and everything else every week.

2 Quests at the moment.
Patreons Lv2 or more have acces to the quests 1 week earlier.
